entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
